name: Rope'n'Fly 2
description:
******************************
Use your ropes to swing an destructible ragdoll from on skyscraper to the others. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a tower to throw your rope there, touch once again to release it and use your acceleration to fly through the sky. Touch again once you come too near to the ground before your break into smithereens.

How far can YOU get before you fall?

Rope'n'Fly 2 FULL VERSION features: (thanks for all your comments to Rope'n'Fly 1, we added quite a lot of requested features to Rope'n'Fly 2):
- tight and fast paced gameplay
- destructible ragdoll effects
- endless playing in never ending cities
- realistic physic engine for the player and the ropes
- Improved graphics, buildings now in 3D
- Music and sound effects
- Realtime Dynamic changing weather effects (rain, thunder)
- Partially destructible ragdoll (doesn't splitter if you just touch the ground slightly, will just loose its legs, etc.)
- New game modes (e.g. distance, limited ropes, etc.) 12 in total
- Multiuser support
- Integration of OpenFeint
- Integrated online leader board / high score system to copare against your friends or all other players
- Integrated offline personal highscore using OpenFeint
- 33 unlockable achievements you get points for, like, 360° air style, highest jump, longest flight, head crash, half man, etc.
- Compare you global points against your friends or all other players

★★★★★ Rope'n'Fly - From dusk till dawn , the sequel to this game is now available! ★★★★★
